text: Robert Arthur Allison (December 3, 1937 - November 9, 2024) was an American Racecar driver. He was the 1983 NASCAR Winston Cup champion. He was on the list of the 50 greatest NASCAR drivers. He was born in Miami, Florida. Allison died on November 9, 2024 at his home in Mooresville, North Carolina at the age of 86.Bobby Allison, ‘Alabama Gang’ legend and Hall of Famer, dies at 86 NASCAR ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1937 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American racecar drivers Category:Daytona 500 winners Category:Sportspeople from Miami
title: Bobby Allison
